content: {"name": "Holy Cross Church", "alternate_name": "", "description": "- You have to live within 15 blocks  of the church\n-Clients must live between the 5th avenue and  delton river\n", "email": "", "url": "https://www.christinthecity.nyc/food-pantries", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "329 W 42nd St", "address_2": null, "city": "New York", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10036", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.7579652, "longitude": -73.9910709}, "phones": [{"number": "(212) 246-4732", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": ""}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: twice a month"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Only serve residents of 30th to 57th Street and from 5th Avenue to 12th Avenue"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Only serve the neighborhood"}]}
